::DrillBit::

DrillBit heard StarScream, and turned to him.
"We have had three continues battles, with them. We are weak and
injured. There will be no fighting, for now. But we WILL get revenge."
He stoped, reconizing the voice, from history tapes.
"StarScream!" He said, surprized.
